about_the_game:
In the age of cowboys, adventurers the world over converge on El Dorado, an ancient city of gold.
However, their highly coveted prize is guarded by a strange magical seal - an everchanging labyrinth of caverns and canyons.
No one has come out alive, but maybe you will find the treasure you seek.

Features
  • Play at your own pace
    Anyone can play, thanks to simple turn-based controls that let you take your time, or speed through as fast as you like.

  • Pick up and play
    Autosaving and short run lengths make it ideal to play at any time, anywhere.

  • Combo King
    Multiply loot dropped by enemies with a combo for massive amounts of money - but be careful - Take too long and your combo will run out!

name: Rootin' Tootin' Lootin' & Shootin' Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+ compatible card
  • Storage: 64 MB available space

short_description: Battle through treacherous levels in this fast-paced, turn-based, six-shooting Rogue-like. Pit your wits against cunning creatures in an everchanging labyrinth of caverns and canyons to reach the ancient city of gold.
